titleStmt.title: The Coffin opened, or, Self-interest discovered, to be laid up in the coffin, under the name of the good old cause in answer to a late pamphlet printed, and reprinted, entituled, A coffin for the good old cause, written by a discarded officer of the army, in the behalf of himself and complices / by H.P., a known friend to the cause and the commonwealth.
titleStmt.author: H. P., Known friend to the cause and the commonwealth.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
